title: Disconnecting from Servers Randomly?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: It's been happening only recently I'm not sure whats exactly happening but it seems like all of my friends are having the same problem. Any ideas?

replies.body: Just don't play ranked for now. They said they can't alter LP for those of us that lost series and 35 additional LP... Likely nothing but an, "Oh sorry guys. We're too busy worrying about the LCS to give a crap about you common folk. Please keep funneling money our way, though! We love that."
Just typical rito with shitty service again. Itll be addressed in like an hour or so is my guess

We've received quite a few reports on these disconnects and have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) message up.  Per f1na1b055 in a [related thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/5G6cx675-anyone-keep-disconnecting-today-a-weird-popup-with-exit-instead-option?comment=0010), it looks like one of our network connection providers is undergoing a maintenance that might be causing this.  Bookmark our status page for  updates, and hang tight until this gets resolved!
I'm having trouble even opening my client. All it does when I try is become a blank dark purple box in the top left of my screen.
Lots of people having this issue. It recently started for me also.
At least it's not only me.
